statements: SELECT * FROM SignatureMetrics
SELECT signature_id, signature_speed FROM SignatureMetrics WHERE signature_pressure > 50
SELECT signature_speed, signature_pressure FROM SignatureMetrics ORDER BY signature_speed DESC
SELECT signature_id, signature_speed, signature_pressure FROM SignatureMetrics WHERE signature_id = 3
SELECT AVG(signature_speed) AS avg_speed, AVG(signature_pressure) AS avg_pressure FROM SignatureMetrics
SELECT signature_speed, signature_pressure FROM SignatureMetrics WHERE signature_id = 1;
SELECT signature_id, signature_pressure, signature_speed FROM SignatureMetrics WHERE signature_speed > 0.5 AND signature_pressure < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM SignatureMetrics WHERE signature_pressure = 0.3 ORDER BY signature_speed DESC;
SELECT signature_speed AS speed, signature_pressure AS pressure FROM SignatureMetrics WHERE signature_speed < 0.5 OR signature_pressure > 0.7;
SELECT DISTINCT signature_id, signature_speed FROM SignatureMetrics WHERE signature_speed BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.8 ORDER BY signature_id DESC, signature_speed ASC;
SELECT * FROM signature_metrics;
SELECT id, speed FROM signature_metrics WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT pressure, speed FROM signature_metrics WHERE speed < pressure;
SELECT * FROM signature_analysis WHERE speed_analyzed = TRUE;
SELECT id, signature_id FROM signature_analysis ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT id, speed FROM signature_metrics WHERE speed > 100;
SELECT * FROM signature_metrics WHERE id = 5;
SELECT signature_metrics.id, speed, pressure, speed_analyzed FROM signature_metrics JOIN signature_analysis ON signature_metrics.id = signature_analysis.signature_id;
SELECT id, pressure_analyzed FROM signature_metrics JOIN signature_analysis ON signature_metrics.id = signature_analysis.signature_id WHERE pressure_analyzed = true;
SELECT pressure, speed_analyzed FROM signature_metrics JOIN signature_analysis ON signature_metrics.id = signature_analysis.signature_id WHERE speed_analyzed = false;
SELECT * FROM signature_speed_metrics ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT id, pressure FROM signature_pressure_metrics WHERE pressure > 50;
SELECT signature_id, speed_metric_id, pressure_metric_id FROM signature_characteristics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM signature_speed_metrics WHERE speed BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM signature_pressure_metrics ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, pressure FROM signature_pressure_metrics WHERE pressure > 50;
SELECT id, speed FROM signature_speed_metrics WHERE speed < 100 ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM signature_characteristics WHERE speed_metric_id = 3 AND pressure_metric_id = 5;
SELECT MAX(speed) AS max_speed, MIN(pressure) AS min_pressure FROM signature_speed_metrics;
SELECT signature_id, timestamp FROM signature_characteristics WHERE speed_metric_id = 2 OR pressure_metric_id = 4 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM signature_speed_metrics ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM signature_pressure_metrics WHERE signature_id = 10;
SELECT signature_id, characteristics FROM signature_characteristics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, signature_id, analysis_result FROM signature_analysis ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM signature_speed_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM signature_speed_metrics WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT signature_id, MAX(pressure) AS max_pressure FROM signature_pressure_metrics GROUP BY signature_id;
SELECT signature_id, characteristics FROM signature_characteristics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM signature_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY signature_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT signature_id, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM signature_speed_metrics GROUP BY signature_id;
SELECT * FROM speed_metrics;
SELECT id, pressure FROM pressure_metrics WHERE pressure > 1000;
SELECT name FROM signature WHERE id = 5;
SELECT signature_id, speed FROM signature_speed_mapping ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT id, signature_id, timestamp FROM pressure_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM signature;
SELECT id, name FROM signature ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT signature_id, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM speed_metrics GROUP BY signature_id HAVING avg_speed > 50;
SELECT s.name, sp.speed FROM signature s JOIN signature_speed_mapping sm ON s.id = sm.signature_id JOIN speed_metrics sp ON sm.speed_id = sp.id;
SELECT s.name, p.pressure FROM signature s JOIN signature_pressure_mapping pm ON s.id = pm.signature_id JOIN pressure_metrics p ON pm.pressure_id = p.id ORDER BY p.pressure DESC;
